thread.title: BRIEF-Fortress REIT To Commence Negotiations With Trustees Of And Other Lenders To Siyakha Education Trusts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fortress REIT To Commence Negotiations With Trustees Of And Other Lenders To Siyakha Education Trusts
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Fortress Reit Ltd:
* ‍TO COMMENCE NEGOTIATIONS WITH TRUSTEES OF AND OTHER LENDERS TO SIYAKHA EDUCATION TRUSTS REGARDING ALL LOANS TO TRUSTS AND UNDERLYING COLLATERAL​
* ‍WILL ENGAGE WITH ALL PARTICIPANTS DURING THIS PROCESS AND IS SENSITIVE TO CONFIDENTIALITY DURING THESE NEGOTIATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
